content: I can't find Cholesterol within the DSTU2 Argonaut specification. Am I missing it? Or is it not there? I am not saying it should be there, just wanting to be sure I am not overlooking it.
That is a general lab measure, and the Argonaut Observation Results Profile and Argonaut DiagnosticReport Profile are used. We did not model or profile down to specific labs. That would be CIMI
Thanks. I will look to the general lab measurement, and see if CIMI have the specific details.
